message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $90 for it.

Hi Bob, I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to commit to $100 for the product.
